Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa.condition.EntitiesInPackageCondition
    io.micronaut.configuration.jooq.JacksonConverterProvider
    Use JsonConverterProvider instead
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa.condition.RequiresHibernateEntities
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa.JpaConfiguration.EntityScanConfiguration.isClasspath()
    Runtime classpath scanning is no longer supported. Use Introspected to declare the packages you want to index at build time. Example @Introspected(packages="foo.bar", includedAnnotations=Entity.class)
    io.micronaut.configuration.jooq.JooqConfigurationProperties.isJacksonConverterEnabled()
    Use JooqConfigurationProperties.isJsonConverterEnabled() instead
    io.micronaut.configuration.hibernate.jpa.JpaConfiguration.EntityScanConfiguration.setClasspath(boolean)
    Runtime classpath scanning is no longer supported. Use Introspected to declare the packages you want to index at build time. Example @Introspected(packages="foo.bar", includedAnnotations=Entity.class)
    io.micronaut.configuration.jdbc.hikari.DatasourceConfiguration.setDataSourceProperties(Properties)
    Use DatasourceConfiguration.setDataSourceProperties(Map) instead
    io.micronaut.configuration.jooq.JooqConfigurationProperties.setJacksonConverterEnabled(boolean)
    Use JooqConfigurationProperties.setJsonConverterEnabled(boolean) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    io.micronaut.configuration.jasync.JasyncPoolConfiguration()
    io.micronaut.configuration.jasync.JasyncPoolConfiguration(JasyncPoolConfiguration.JasyncSslConfiguration)
    Use {@link JasyncPoolConfiguration(JasyncPoolConfiguration, List) instead
